description: Located in the heart of Vancouverâ€™s West Side, Boxwood Green delivers boutique townhome living with style, comfort, and unmatched walkability. This beautifully maintained 3-bed, 3-bath home offers 1,636 sq ft of thoughtfully designed living with an open-concept main floor, brand-new gourmet kitchen, and quiet south-facing courtyard patio. Two generous bedrooms sit upstairs, while the top level is a dreamy private primary retreat with spa ensuite and balcony. Plus a flexible lower-level family room, powder room, fresh paint, premium Miele & JennAir appliances, and secure double garage. Walking distance to VGH, Seawall, Granville Island, Whole Foods, parks and more! Book your appointment today!
